title: List of all Android shared  app libraries for use in your project
meta: See collection of all Android shared  app libraries, filter by license, modified date, languages, and select best for your usecase.

repoList.name: android_dbinspector
repoList.description: Android library for viewing and sharing in app databases.

repoList.name: android
repoList.description: Common Utils library is developed to reduce efforts to achieve common features of the android apps. While developing the apps, we realized that we’re coding for many common features in all the apps. For e.g. check the network’s availability, using shared preferences, parsing, etc. And like us, many other android developers might be doing the same. So it needs to be reduced for all to save the development time with ease. This is how an idea popped in our mind, and we decided to develop an SDK which can reduce developers’ time and efforts.

repoList.name: AppDataReader
repoList.description: A library for reading Shared Preferences and Database values within the application.

repoList.name: WhatTheCodec
repoList.description: A sample app that uses FFmpeg's shared libraries

repoList.name: AndroidSystemShare
repoList.description: a multitype share library base android system share

repoList.name: Android-Resource-File-Provider
repoList.description: A simple library to easily provide and share files from app resources

repoList.name: Lynx
repoList.description: Lynx is an Android library created to show a custom view with all the information Android logcat is printing, different traces of different levels will be rendererd to show from log messages to your application exceptions. You can filter this traces, share your logcat to other apps, configure the max number of traces to show or the sampling rate used by the library.

repoList.name: MyNDKLibApp
repoList.description: Tutorial to create a CMake based Android Studio NDK shared library and application.

repoList.name: SkipTheLibrary
repoList.description: Collaborative book sharing app!

repoList.name: OlaPlayStudio
repoList.description: Online Music Streaming Player.Plays music from a Rest api's url.I am loading data from rest Api using volley library here.This app also allows to download,share,play music .
